author: Purna Singh
title: We will continue to serve people with new energy: Arvind Kejriwal
text: Live [Dhanush’s ‘Captain Miller’ all set to hit screens on Jan 12](/cinema/tollywood/dhanushs-captain-miller-all-set-to-hit-screens-on-jan-12-847827) [‘Kurchi Madathapetti’ from ‘Guntur Kaaram:’ A high-voltage mass number](/cinema/tollywood/kurchi-madathapetti-from-guntur-kaaram-a-high-voltage-mass-number-847826) [We will continue to serve people with new energy: Arvind Kejriwal](/news/national/we-will-continue-to-serve-people-with-new-energy-arvind-kejriwal-847825) [Actor Shritej expresses his joy for his films in 2023](/cinema/tollywood/actor-shritej-expresses-his-joy-for-his-films-in-2023-847824) [‘Hanu-Man’ clears censor; gets U/A](/cinema/tollywood/hanu-man-clears-censor-gets-ua-847823) [‘Bujjikondave’ from ‘Saindhav’ shows different facet of father-daughter relationship](/cinema/tollywood/bujjikondave-from-saindhav-shows-different-facet-of-father-daughter-relationship-847822) [Naresh completes golden jubilee in showbiz, meets his mentor Ramoji Rao](/cinema/tollywood/naresh-completes-golden-jubilee-in-showbiz-meets-his-mentor-ramoji-rao-847821) [Actor Murali Mohan felicitated](/cinema/tollywood/actor-murali-mohan-felicitated-847820) [Amitabh Bachchan bids emotional farewell to ‘KBC 15’](/cinema/bollywood/amitabh-bachchan-bids-emotional-farewell-to-kbc-15-847819) [Shabir Ahluwalia shares about donning female avatar](/cinema/bollywood/shabir-ahluwalia-shares-about-donning-female-avatar-847818) Just In We will continue to serve people with new energy: Arvind Kejriwal After returning from a ten-day Vipassana meditation program in Punjab's Hoshiarpur region, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal informed through his social media account X on Saturday that he had returned to the national capital. New Delhi: After returning from a ten-day Vipassana meditation program in Punjab's Hoshiarpur region, Delhi Chief Minister [Arvind Kejriwal](https://www.thehansindia.com/tags/Arvind Kejriwal) informed through his social media account X on Saturday that he had returned to the national capital. He further said in a post that this sadhana gives me immense peace, and from today onwards, we will again start serving the public with new energy. Good luck to all! It is worth noting that Kejriwal is scheduled to appear before the Enforcement Directorate (ED) on January 3 for interrogation in a money laundering case involving excise policy. Gautam Lal, a trustee of the DDVC, recognized Kejriwal before he left the meditation center. This was Kejriwal's first time practicing Vipassana in Punjab. He has already completed similar practice in Jaipur, Nagpur, Dharamkot, and Bengaluru. Vipassana, an ancient Indian meditation method, focuses on self-transformation through self-observation. During the meditation, Kejriwal followed all the rules, including refraining from using mobile phones, the internet, television, and newspapers. A DDVC spokesperson said his daily routine starts at 4 a.m. and ends at 9 p.m., with simple food and no eating after noon.
